hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
export BUILD_TYPE=Release export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/libweintek_stable/workspace export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/build-stable-branch export WEINTEK_P2P_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/weintek-p2p
cd ${WEINTEK_P2P_PATH} cp config_linux.h config.h mkdir -p jenkins cd jenkins
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT3000" ]; then export ENV_SOURCE=/home/ci/work/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ${WEINTEK_P2P_PATH}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/cmake_weintek_p2p.sh ${WEINTEK_P2P_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${ENV_SOURCE} RelWithDebInfo elif [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then ${WEINTEK_P2P_PATH}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/cmake_weintek_p2p.sh ${WEINTEK_P2P_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} RelWithDebInfo fi
make VERBOSE=0 install/strip
cd ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then upx weintek-p2p fi

#!/bin/bash
export BUILD_TYPE=Release export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/libweintek_stable/workspace export LIBWEINTEK_ROOT=${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/build-stable-branch
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT3000") export MODEL_NAME=E60 ;; "cMT-SVR") export MODEL_NAME=E30 ;; esac
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT3000") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=c30 ;; "cMT-SVR") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=e30 ;; esac
cd ${WORKSPACE}/rma mkdir -p jenkins cd jenkins
touch ${WORKSPACE}/rma/AuthClient/easy_access_client_manager.bin.cpp
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT3000" ]; then export BREAKPAD_INCLUDE_DIR=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/sysroots/armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi/usr/include/breakpad source /home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${BUILD_TYPE} \ -DMODEL=${MODEL_NAME} \ -DGOOGLE_BREAKPAD_DIR=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/google-breakpad \ -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${INSTALL_PREFIX} \ .. elif [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${BUILD_TYPE} \ -DMODEL=${MODEL_NAME} \ -DGOOGLE_BREAKPAD_DIR=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/google-breakpad \ -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${INSTALL_PREFIX} \ -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${LIBWEINTEK_PATH}/build/cMT-SVR/Toolchain-arm-fsl-linux-gnueabi.cmake \ .. fi
cd AuthClient rm -f easy_access_client_manager make VERBOSE=1 easy_access_client_manager strip easy_access_client_manager if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then upx easy_access_client_manager fi bin2cpp easy_access_client_manager cp easy_access_client_manager.bin.cpp ${WORKSPACE}/rma/AuthClient make VERBOSE=1 install/strip # make easy_access_client # strip easy_access_client # upx easy_access_client # cp easy_access_client ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin cd ../RemoteAccessActivator make VERBOSE=1 easy_access_activator strip easy_access_activator cp easy_access_activator ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin
cd ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then upx easy_access_client fi /home/ci/work/crypto e easy_access_client easy_access_client.${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME}.${TRIGGER_PARAM_EAC_VERSION}

cd ${WORKSPACE} export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/build-stable-branch rm -rf artifacts mkdir artifacts cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/easy_access_client* artifacts cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/easy_access_activator artifacts cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/weintek-p2p artifacts
